scripts.docker: yarn lockgen && docker build -t menheramaster:$npm_package_version . && docker run -d --restart unless-stopped -p 35425:35425 --name MenheraMaster menheramaster:$npm_package_version
scripts.docker:win: yarn lockgen && docker build -t menheramaster:%npm_package_version% . && docker run -d --restart unless-stopped -p 35425:35425 --name MenheraMaster menheramaster:%npm_package_version%
